chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: LORD, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
items.plainText: LORD, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?

items.text: He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
items.plainText: He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.

items.text: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
items.plainText: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.

items.text: In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the LORD. He that sweareth to his own hurt, and changeth not.
items.plainText: In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the LORD. He that sweareth to his own hurt, and changeth not.

items.text: He that putteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these things shall never be moved.
items.plainText: He that putteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these things shall never be moved.
